Premium Virtual Private Servers from XeHost - Virtuozzo Power Panel, Fantastico, FFMpeg & Red5, and more!

Welcome
XeHost.net is a friendly, reliable, and secure environment to place your web hosting account! We closely monitor and maintain our servers, ensuring optimum performance for all our valued customers, and their visitors. We never oversell our resources, so you will have complete peace of mind with us.

We offer honest, fast, friendly, and helpful support, and are keen to help both new and experienced clients alike.

All plans include:
» cPanel Control Panel
» Fantastico automated software installations
» Vituozzo Power Panel
» SSH Root Access
» FFMpeg & Red5 Pre-Installed
» PHP4 & PHP5 Installed
» Free firewall protection
» Free account migrations
» Free backups and restores
» Fast and friendly support 24/7/365
» And much more....
